LanguageData.BEWH.ModSettingsShowTabName: Always show Rank tab for player pawns. Will show even if no category or rank is available to the pawn.
LanguageData.BEWH.CheckVEFPatches: Remember to check Vanilla Expanded Framework toggable patches for more settings for this mod!
LanguageData.BEWH.CannotRecruitMessage: {1} tried to recruit {0}, but {0}'s unbreakable loyalty to their faction made them resist all attempts.\n\n{0} cannot be recruited.
LanguageData.BEWH.CannotEnslaveMessage: {1} tried to enslave {0}, but {0}'s unbreakable loyalty to their faction made them resist all attempts.\n\n{0} cannot be enslaved.
LanguageData.BEWH.OnlyOneBuildingAllowedPerMap: You may only place one {0} per map.
LanguageData.BEWH.RequirementsTraitAtLeastOne: At least one of the following traits
LanguageData.BEWH.RequirementsGeneAtLeastOne: At least one of the following genes
LanguageData.BEWH.RequirementsLimit: Only {0} may have this rank at a time. Every{2} colonist will increase this limit by 1. Currently {1} exists.
LanguageData.BEWH.RequirementsLimitOnlyOneEver: Only {0} may ever have this rank. Currently {1} exists.
LanguageData.BEWH.HaveBeenRankForDays: Must have been a {0} for at least {1} days
LanguageData.BEWH.HaveAchievedRank: Must have achieved the rank of {0}
LanguageData.BEWH.NoUnlockedRanksOfCategory: {0} does not have any ranks of category {1}
